effect.shortEffect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.
effect.full: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.

description.diamond-pearl: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
description.platinum: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
description.black-white: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.
description.black-2-white-2: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.
description.x-y: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases.
description.sun-moon: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
description.sword-shield: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP decreases every turn.
